sn36.27:2.1: 3 The Explanation of the Hundred and Eight
sn36.27:4.4: There are ascetics and brahmins who don’t truly understand these three feelings’ gratification, drawback, and escape.
sn36.27:4.5: I don’t consider them to be true ascetics and brahmins. Those venerables don’t realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and don’t live having achieved it with their own insight.
sn36.27:4.6: There are ascetics and brahmins who do truly understand these three feelings’ gratification, drawback, and escape.
sn36.27:4.7: I consider them to be true ascetics and brahmins.
sn36.27:4.8: Those venerables realize the goal of life as an ascetic or brahmin, and live having achieved it with their own insight.”
